data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Khomas who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khomas, Namibia

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Khomas who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary: On average, 79 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Khomas, Namibia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Khomas to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Khomas, Namibia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Khomas, Namibia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Khomas, Namibia. Please, stir the 42,667 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.section_summary:
the state of Khomas, Namibia has a population of 342,100.

We estimate Khomas has 42,667 people who might know Jesus, 261,066 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 38,366 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Khomas a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Khomas
location.people_groups_list: Kung-Tsumkwe, Luyana, Kwangali, Heikum, Nusan, Xoo, Gciriku
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kung-Tsumkwe (42,000), Luyana, Kwangali (8,400), Heikum (22,000), Nusan, Xoo (500), Gciriku (2,600)
